metadata.title: CVE-2023-29159 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Starlette versions 0.13.5 and laterand prior to 0.27.0 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to view filesin a web service which was built using Starlette.

criterions.comment: starlette package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
